LanguageData.Tango_MainTurret.label: автоматична гармата 20х120мм
LanguageData.Tango_MainTurret.description: A heavy automatic turret mounted on a Tango APC. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but it’s inaccurate and uses up a lot of ammo.
LanguageData.Tango_MainTurret.fireModes.0.label: Single
LanguageData.Tango_MainTurret.fireModes.1.label: Burst
